function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on social media for communication may lead to misinformation or incomplete information being shared with customers.","Impact":"Customers may receive incorrect information about health and safety protocols, leading to increased risk of disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Implement a strategy for fact-checking and verifying information before sharing it on social media platforms.","Technologies":"Social media monitoring and management tools that can track and verify information shared on social media.","People":"Food truck owners, social media managers.","Owner":"Food truck owners, social media managers."},{"Description":"Limited presence on social media platforms may result in decreased visibility and communication with customers.","Impact":"Customers may be uninformed about business operations and health and safety measures, leading to potential risks of disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Expand presence on multiple social media platforms to ensure comprehensive communication with customers.","Technologies":"Social media scheduling and management tools for efficient posting and engagement.","People":"Food truck owners, social media managers.","Owner":"Food truck owners, social media managers."},{"Description":"Interpretation and theory building process may lead to biases or misinterpretations in the proposed framework of service ecosystemic value co-creation.","Impact":"Inaccurate or biased framework may result in ineffective strategies for disease mitigation and value co-creation.","Mitigation":"Engage in peer review and consultation with industry experts to validate and refine the proposed framework.","Technologies":"Collaboration and project management tools for peer review and consultation.","People":"Researchers, industry experts.","Owner":"Research team, industry experts."}]}
